ComicInfo.Title: Warbound, Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary: Warbound, Part 1: Amadeus Cho catches up with Jen Walters and manages to help her become She-Hulk again by forcing a fight with Doc Samson. Amadeus then meets up with Hercules and Angel in a bid to get them to support him. Meanwhile Hulk and his Warbound are nearing Earth.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 18:55:39. [Issue ID 354796]

ComicInfo.Tags: She-Hulk [Jennifer Walters],Iceman [Bobby Drake]] (flashback),Mr. Fantastic [Reed Richards],Darkstar,Black Widow [Natasha Romanova],Hercules,Champions [Angel [Warren Worthington III],Ghost Rider [Johnny Blaze],Iron Man [Tony Stark] (flashback),Doc Samson [Leonard Samson],Hulk [Bruce Banner] (flashback),Mastermind Excello [Amadeus Cho]
ComicInfo.StoryArc: Planet Without a Hulk,World War Hulk
